name: WereGarurumon
effect: [On Play] If you have a Tamer in play, gain 2 memory. If you don't have a Tamer in play, you may play 1 blue Tamer card from your hand without paying its memory cost.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When this Digimon becomes unsuspended during your main phase, gain 1 memory.
